Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Goblet
Description: Wide goblet with a cylindrical base, slightly restricted mouth and simple lip. The upper section of the exterior surface bears a red-brown slip. Made from a fine pink clay, it bears no decoration. A slight asymmetry is the result of a problem during the lifting process. Throwing marks are highly visible on the lower section.
